law.catch_line: Within 20 years from the date the cause of action accrues, a person shall:...

text.section:
Within 20 years from the date the cause of action accrues, a person shall:
File an action for recovery of possession of a corporeal freehold or leasehold estate in land; or
Enter on the land.

section.section: This section does not affect the common-law doctrine of prescription as it applies to the creation of incorporeal interests in land by adverse use.
This section does not affect the periods of limitations set forth in § 6-103 or § 8-107 of the Real Property Article.
